p: In the District of the 1st Judicial District
Charles Gahres & Martha J Garhes Plffs
W H Barrett Isabella Barrett Defts

The Defendants for and to Plaintiffs complaint that on the 12th day July 1871 at the city of Walla Walla in an action brought in this court herein Charles Gahres & Martha J Gahres was Plaintiffs and W.H. Barrett & Isabella Sutton now Isabella Barrett Defnedants herein was defendants in said action. For the same cause of action as that alledged in this cause and said defendants measured Judgement against said Plaintiffs in said cause duly given upon the merits and these defendants was by the said Judgement awarded the care and custody of the said child Etta Dora Cravens and that the said Plaintiffs pay the cost of said action. Wherefore Defendants pray Judgement that Plaintiffs proceedings be aforesaid and that they have and there costs in this proceedings
W.A. Gorge & B. L. Slaipture Attys for Defts
